greeting: Hello! How can I help you today?
Hi there! What can I do for you?
Greetings! How may I assist you?
help: I can help you with a variety of tasks. What do you need help with?
I'm here to assist you. What can I do for you?
You can ask me questions, and I'll do my best to answer them.
name: I am LOKI, your personal AI assistant.
You can call me LOKI.
My name is LOKI.
weather: I'm sorry, I cannot provide weather information.
I am not connected to a weather service.
You can check a weather website for that information.
time: I do not have the current time.
You can check the clock on your device for the time.
joke: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
What do you call a fake noodle? An Impasta!
I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.
default: I'm sorry, I don't understand. Could you please rephrase that?
I'm not sure I understand. Can you try again?
I'm still learning and I'm not sure how to respond to that.
